thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Suntak Circuit Technology proposes 2017 dividend payment plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Suntak Circuit Technology proposes 2017 dividend payment plan

organizations.name: shenzhen suntak circuit technology co ltd

text:
Feb 13(Reuters) - Shenzhen Suntak Circuit Technology Co Ltd
* Says actual controller proposed to pay a cash dividend of 5.40 yuan for every 10 shares (before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares, as the dividend payment plan for 2017
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/DnRFgN
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
